document.docAuthor: Asenjo, Angélico, Irmler, Ulrich, Klimaszewski, Jan, Chandler, Donald S., Fierros-López, Hugo Eduardo & Vieira, Juliana S.
document.masterDocTitle: Staphylinidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) in Latin America: synopsis, annotated catalog, diversity and distribution

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Staphylinidae (Insecta: Coleoptera) in Latin America: synopsis, annotated catalog, diversity and distribution

bibRefCitation.author: Raffray, A.
bibRefCitation.refString: Raffray, A. (1895 a) Revision du genre Tyropsis Saulcy (Aplodea Reitter) et description de deux genres nouveaux du meme groupe. Annales de la Societe Entomologique de France, 64, 391 - 400.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species:
Aplodea villosa L.W. Schaufuss, 1886

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Hualpenia H.
Franz, 1996: 124
[synonymized by
Hlaváč & Chandler 2005: 86
]

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species:
Hualpenia relicta H. Franz, 1996
6 species are known from and are restricted to South America.

Characters/Description: Raffray 1904a: 366 (characters in key); Raffray 1908a: 356 (characters in key), 384 (characters); O. Park 1942: 296 (characters in key), 305 (characters); Jeannel 1962b: 449 (characters in key), 470 (characters); Hlaváč & Chandler 2005: 86 (characters), 93 (characters in key).
Key: Jeannel 1962b: 470 (species of the genus).
Distribution.
South America: Chile , Argentina .

Type species:
Neotyropsis chomei H. Franz, 1996
2 species are known from and are restricted to South America.
Characters/Description: Hlaváč & Chandler 2005: 93 (characters in key).
Distribution.
South America: Chile .

bibRefCitation.author: Raffray, A.
bibRefCitation.refString: Raffray, A. (1895 a) Revision du genre Tyropsis Saulcy (Aplodea Reitter) et description de deux genres nouveaux du meme groupe. Annales de la Societe Entomologique de France, 64, 391 - 400.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species:
Aplodea gibbicollis L.W. Schaufuss, 1886
6 species are known from and are restricted to Latin America.
Key: Jeannel 1962b: 451 (species of the genus).
Distribution.
West Indies: Trinidad-Tobago.
Central America: Panama .
South America: Venezuela , Brazil , Argentina .

Type species:
Pseudotyropsis pseudopalpalis H. Franz, 1996
Only one species is known from and is restricted to South America.
Distribution.
South America: Chile .

bibRefCitation.author: Borgmeier, T.
bibRefCitation.refString: Borgmeier, T. (1954) Zur Kenntnis der Termitophilen Pselaphiden Brasiliens (Coleoptera, Pselaphidae). Revista Brasileira de Zoologia, 14 (2), 201 - 214.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species:
Termitotyrus palpalis Borgmeier, 1954

Type species:
Aplodea hirta Reitter, 1888
4 species are known from and are restricted to South America.
Distribution.
South America: Brazil .

Type species:
Tyrogatunus zeteki O. Park, 1942
Only one species is known from and is restricted to Central America.
Characters/Description: O. Park 1942: 296 (characters in key); Hlaváč & Chandler 2005: 93 (characters in key). Distribution.
Central America: Panama .

Type species:
Tyropsidius mochae H. Franz, 1996
Only one species is known from and is restricted to South America.
Distribution.
South America: Chile .

bibRefCitation.author: Saulcy, F. de
bibRefCitation.refString: Saulcy, F. de (1874) Species des Paussides, Clavigerides, Pselaphides & Scydmenides de l'Europe et des pays circonvoisins. Bulletin de la Societe d'Histoire Naturelle de Metz, 13, 1 - 132.

subSubSection.paragraph:

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type species:
Paratyropsis spinosissima H. Franz, 1996
32 species are known from and are restricted to South America.

Characters/Description: Raffray 1904a: 367 (characters in key); Raffray 1908a: 356 (characters in key), 386 (characters); O. Park 1942: 296 (characters in key), 298 (characters); Jeannel 1962b: 450 (characters in key), 452 (characters); Hlaváč & Chandler 2005: 86 (characters), 94 (characters in key).
Distribution.
South America: Chile , Argentina .
